
{{ModuleFunction|cURL}}
Cleans up the curl handle.

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
curlCleanup(curl handler)
</syntaxhighlight>

==Required arguments==
* '''curl''' The curl handler

==Returns==
Nothing usefull

==Example==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
curl = curlInit("http://mtasa.com/");
if not curl then
    outputDebugString("Can't connect to http://mtasa.com/ with cURL");
else
    curlPerform(curl);
    curlCleanup(curl);
    curlClose(curl);
end
</syntaxhighlight>
